analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/23/0x04023aa3cee210695fa7fe237b1d8d4a91cee469.sol:
	Contract CVerificationToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/23/0x04023aa3cee210695fa7fe237b1d8d4a91cee469.sol#206-207)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/23/0x04023aa3cee210695fa7fe237b1d8d4a91cee469.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.23 (/unique_chucks/23/0x04023aa3cee210695fa7fe237b1d8d4a91cee469.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/23/0x04023aa3cee210695fa7fe237b1d8d4a91cee469.sol#74-75) is not in mixedCase
